item.description:
Wow, another wonderful year to wrap up.

A favorite fun event ...Celebrating and Attracting!!

Come share "shamelessly" what you HAVE deliberately manifested this year... or in the process of manifesting. We want to CELEBRATE with you.

ExperienceÂ JOYful activities to open yourself to be a heart-centered attractor.

Discover new ways to be a more powerful attractor in 2013.

Bring a favorite MAIN ENTREE to share. We will provide the desserts & refreshments. You're welcome to bring wine too (as an extra to share).

We are very thankful that we have attracted you wonderful folks into our lives this year.

much JOY!

ChewHoong & Dave ***************************************************************

For parking and directions (via T or driving) info to Dave's loft :

(1) Go here: http://www.meetup.com/lawofattraction-us/files/

(2) Sign in

(3) Scroll down & open file "Directions & Parking_BostonLOA Meetup"

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Celebrate and Attract!!
